Name: Frequency of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' compared to 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Metric: Frequency of activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' for cases where activity 'Review Round' occurs

Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' out of all 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1'

Metric: Frequency of activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' for cases where activity 'SW-Reviewer No Response' occurs

Metric: Number of 'SW-Reviewer Declined' activities for cases where activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' occurs
